PageData.SubHeading: 11.18._Real-Time Multimedia Content Processing and Massive Scaling

PageText.pText: Usage of large amount of multimedia data and information in real time and its mining is a big challenge in the integration of heterogeneous and massive data sources with cloud. To classify this real-time multimedia information and contents such that it may trigger the relevant services and assist the user in his current location is also a big challenge to be handled.
